item.description:
Dear Innovators,

Our regular August public meeting is coming up! Please join us on Aug. 3, Wednesday at 7PM. 

This is an open meeting - you can bring friends or invite the public - admission is free! You do not have to be a dues paying member of IRN to attend.

Our speaker this month is an expert on Patent Searching. Paulina Borrego is the Reference Services Librarian at the Science & Engineering Library of Umass/Amherst. Her insights will be very valuable to all innovators. 

Hope to see you there!

------------------------------

We are also starting to record audio from our open meetings - and have started a Podcast series, which you can find on itunes at the following link:
http://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/innovation-invention-speakers/id433329307
or, on the web at:
http://hearth.com/podcast/irn/podcast.xml

In order to keep our members up to date with links, annoucements and other such news - we have started a facebook page at:
hhttp://www.facebook.com/pages/Holyoke-Massachusetts/Innovato rs-Resource-Network/210705578957971
http://tinyurl.com/67kd75w (shortened version)

Please "like" us on facebook - we need to get a certain amount of people who check in to reap the benefits. You can also add your own comments and links, so we can have a continual exchange of links and upcoming events.
item.name: IRN - Public Open Meeting - August 3rd Springfield
